actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to improve needs analysis in the student aid programs under that Act.
short_title: Student Financial Aid Improvement Act of 1991

summary.text: Student Financial Aid Improvement Act of 1991 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise needs analysis provisions for Pell Grants and for student aid programs generally, with respect to the following: (1) independent students; (2) prevention of double counting of income in asset computations; (3) exclusion of non-liquid assets (family home, farm, or small business); (4) treatment of award year earnings; (5) restriction of parents not enrolled in a degree or certificate program; and (6) student contribution.

titles.title: Student Financial Aid Improvement Act of 1991
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to improve needs analysis in the student aid programs under that Act.
